tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP We)) (VP (VBD did) (RB n't) (VP (VB participate) (PP (IN in) (S (VP (VB follow) (NP-TMP (NNP friday) (NN yesterday))))))) (. .)))
